description: information about works of classical literature

command.prompt:
Generate 2 rows for a table of information about works of classical literature. The semi-colon-separated header of attributes for the table is:
Characters;Locations;Author;Title;Year;Rating;Style;Genre;Poem;Element;Length;Theme

Do not generate fictional rows. Generate the rows from real known data. Here is a list of semi-colon-separated rows not to generate by semantic key only:
Author;Title
Austen;Pride and Prejudice
Dickens;Great Expectations
Garcia-Marquez;One Hundred Years of Solitude
Hardy;Tess of the d'Urbervilles
Herrick;To the Virgins
Homer;The Iliad
Joyce;Ulysses
Plath;Ariel
Shakespeare;As You Like It
Shelley;Ozymandias
Vonnegut;Slaughterhouse-Five

Output the rows in the format of a semi-colon-separated .csv file with a column header. Then explain the source of the new data.
command.output_table:
Characters;Locations;Author;Title;Year;Rating;Style;Genre;Poem;Element;Length;Theme
Characters: Dante, Virgil;Locations: Hell, Purgatory, Heaven;Author: Dante Alighieri;Title: The Divine Comedy;Year: 1320;Rating: 5/5;Style: Poetic Narrative;Genre: Italian Literature, Fantasy, Religious;Poem: Yes;Element: Fire;Length: Long;Theme: Morality, Spirituality, Journey
command.prologue: Characters: Telemachus, Penelope, Odysseus; Locations: Ithaca, Mediterranean; Author: Homer; Title: The Odyssey; Year: 800 BC; Rating: 5/5; Style: Epic Poetry; Genre: Greek Literature, Fantasy, Adventure; Poem: Yes; Element: Water; Length: Long; Theme: Return, Loyalty, Revenge
command.epilogue: The data for the second row is sourced from "The Divine Comedy" by Dante Alighieri, a long poetic narrative from Italian literature. The main characters are Dante and Virgil, who travel through Hell, Purgatory, and Heaven. The poem is written in Poetic Narrative style and is considered one of the greatest works of Italian literature.
